events.message: I received the wrong size for my recent order and would like to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The reported problem has been identified as a refund request related to incorrect order size received by the customer.
The case was assigned to the refunds team specialist to handle the customer's inquiry quickly and efficiently.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong size. I am here to assist you with the return and refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the item and the packing slip to verify the issue and process your refund promptly?
I have attached the photo of the received item along with the packing slip that shows the original order details.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the return label shipment today and process your refund once we receive the item back.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate how fast you are handling this and look forward to the refund.
The refund has been processed successfully and the return label was sent to your email. Please check your inbox.
Just following up to ensure you received the refund and if thereâ€™s anything else we can assist you with today.
Since we have not heard back from you, we are closing the case. Feel free to contact us anytime for further help.
